name: KnowWhy - Decision Tracker
description: Capture decisions from your Slack conversations automatically using AI
long_description:
KnowWhy helps teams capture and track decisions made in Slack conversations. Using AI, it automatically detects when a decision is made and saves it to your decision library.

**Features:**
- Automatic decision detection in channels
- Real-time analysis via webhooks
- Decision library with search
- Integration with GitLab and Google Meet

**Required Permissions:**
- Read messages in channels and conversations
- Access information about channels

**Setup:**
1. Install this app
2. Go to the Event Subscriptions page
3. Enable events and subscribe to message.channels
4. Add your webhook URL from KnowWhy Settings
5. You're ready to track decisions!

This app automatically captures decisions from your Slack conversations using AI.
